name: Dangerous Intermission
description:
Game made to participate in the Mini jam Intermission;

Prologue

A unnamed mining ship just happens to run out off fuel in a mushroom cave...

"Intermission time my boys, get the Robots and repel the 'Shoroons!" says the Ship Captain almost laughting, it happened just like he espected.

"Sorry guys we only have one controller, we have to take turns."

"Remember the Robots goes into Autopilot after some hits"

The mining ship need to survive until the help comes or the ship crew find another way.

CONTROLLS: "WASD" to move;  "Left click" to  shoot;  "1 2 3 4 " to change weapon;  "Space Bar" to Dash if an Gamepad is connect (any modern gamepad should work): "Left Stick" to move;   "Right Stick" to  aim; "RT of XBOX controller" to shoot "B of XBOX controller" to Dash; "DPAD" to change weapon;
